m_FlavorText:
Nobody knows who invented the time bug,

because he hasn't been born yet.
m_GameText:
Flight

Shuffle two Time Bugs you control that dealt damage to an opposing champion this turn into your deck [ARROWR] Take an additional turn after this one.
m_DesignNotes: [SB]: Text is unclear: when damage happens, a trigger goes on the stack, that trigger requires you to pay a cost, but not clear what happens if you can't pay the cost, also unclear whether the take an addition turn after this one goes on the stack or resolves along with paying the cost, though it usually won't matter.
